alert.note: Alert for Deuel (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 7:22PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Deuel County through 700 PM MDT... At 622 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lodgepole to 7 miles southwest of Chappell to near Sedgwick. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chappell and Mount Vernon. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 78 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
